project.name: C-C682A-SUBV-04-ST04-DT06-DF06-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C682A-SUBV-04-ST04-DT06-DF06-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read a hex integer from the input. If hexinteger is negative, ignore. If hexinteger < 0x0000FFFF, do nothing. If hexinteger >= 0x0000FFFF try to zero-out the upper two bytes using char pointers. Perform an incorrect calculation, and rather than zero-ing out the upper two bytes, zero out two different bytes, which corrupts pointers on the stack and results in a seg fault.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 3931 -s 7 -m "10" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C682A-SUBV-04-ST04-DT06-DF06-CF19-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read a hex integer from the input. If hexinteger is negative, ignore. If hexinteger < 0x0000FFFF, do nothing. If hexinteger >= 0x0000FFFF try to zero-out the upper two bytes using char pointers. Perform an incorrect calculation, and rather than zero-ing out the upper two bytes, zero out two different bytes, which corrupts pointers on the stack and results in a seg fault.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 3931 -s 7 -m "0" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
